title.rendered: ‘I wish this day would have never come’: Rafael Nadal reacted over Roger Federer’s retirement

content.rendered:
Reacting to his feeling over Roger Federer’s retirement, Rafael Nadal wrote on Twitter,

De Roger, my friend, and Rival. I wish this day [Retirement Day]would have never come. It’s a sad day for me personally and for sports around the world.

Rafael Nadal

We have many more moments to share together in the future, there are still lots of things to do together, we know that. For now, I truly wish you all the best. I’ll see you in London in Laver Cup, he added.

Rafael Nadal

Read also:US Open 2022: Carlos Alcaraz wins men’s singles Grand Slam Title against C Ruud, becomes youngest world number one in history
